summary: Cadbury is a famous British chocolate company, now owned by Mondelez International. It was started in 1824 by John Cadbury, who sold tea and coffee before making chocolate. The company is known for its Dairy Milk chocolate and Creme Eggs. It was one of the biggest chocolate makers in the world for many years. Cadbury was bought by Kraft Foods in 2010. The company has a long history of helping its workers and making changes to improve corporate behavior.
title: Cadbury
